original_text: A woman was living in this part of the country. She was one of the Canaanite people. She came to see Jesus. She was shouting with a loud voice, ‘ Son of David, help me, sir! A bad spirit is living inside my daughter. It is giving her much pain.’
korean_text: 가나안 여자 하나가 그 지경에서 나와서 소리 질러 이르되 주 다윗의 자손이여 나를 불쌍히 여기소서 내 딸이 흉악하게 귀신 들렸나이다 하되

sentences.original_text: A woman was living in this part of the country.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 여자가 이 지역에 살고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: She was one of the Canaanite people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 가나안 사람 중 한 명이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: She was shouting with a loud voice,
A bad spirit is living inside my daughter.
sentences.korean_translation: 나쁜 영이 내 딸 안에 살고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: It is giving her much pain.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그녀에게 많은 고통을 주고 있습니다.'
